description.@en: When night comes and the shadows mock me with their hidden evil and my mind spirals at the dreadful possibilities within, I find other spirits to quiet my mind. The bitter liquid chases away the dark, keeping the fear at bay, as well as my senses.

effect.@en: Whenever you have committed to achieving a goal, you add +30% Base Chance to succeed at Toughness and Resolve Tests while doing it. However, you cannot succeed at Toughness and Resolve Tests when you are not working toward some end goal.
